name: Ram

biography.description: Ram uses the BU-GI Auto Breacher, a deployable mini-tank that destroys breakable surfaces and devices in its path, leaving a trail of destruction.

gameplayTips: Deploy the BU-GI Auto Breacher to clear paths and destroy enemy gadgets.
Use the destruction caused by the breacher to create new sightlines and opportunities.
Coordinate with teammates to maximize the tactical advantage of the breacher.
